cast.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.
cast.title: The Conjuring

details.biography: Talented actress and model Kyla Marie Deaver was born on March 25, 2003 in Southern California and moved to Atlanta when she was five years old. She has launched an exciting acting career with the short film release of The Candy Shop. In 2013 she played April Perron in the movie The Conjuring, she got to film an episode for the new showtime Tv series "Masters of Sex" as well as an episode for "Drop Dead Diva".
details.name: Kyla Deaver
